Address.label: Address
Address.value: 800 CAPITOL STREET,SUITE 3000, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Waste Management ranks as the largest integrated provider of traditional solid waste services in the United States, operating approximately 268 active landfills and about 350 transfer stations (includes acquired Advanced Disposal landfills and transfer stations). The company serves residential, commercial, and industrial end markets and is also a leading recycler in North America.
